biotools.summary: quickLD (qLD) is a tool to calculate Linkage disequilibrium (the non-random association between alleles at different loci), with highly efficient CPU and GPU kernels that utilize dense linear algebra (DLA) operations.

bioschemas.name: quickLD
bioschemas.summary: quickLD (qLD) is a tool to calculate Linkage disequilibrium (the non-random association between alleles at different loci), with highly efficient CPU and GPU kernels that utilize dense linear algebra (DLA) operations.
